snippet: The police said Thursday that they had arrested a second suspect in connection with the gang-rape and murder of a teenager who was mutilated and left to die.
lead_paragraph: The police said Thursday that they had arrested a second suspect in connection with the gang-rape and murder of a teenager who was mutilated and left to die.

headline.main: Arrests and Outrage After a Rape and Murder in South Africa
headline.print_headline: South Africa: Arrests and Outrage After a Rape and Murder
